SELECT amr.stt as stt, ac.maBn as ma_bn, p.hoTen as ho_ten, p.soCccd as so_cccd, p.ngaySinh as ngay_sinh, p.gioiTinh as gioi_tinh, p.nhomMau as nhom_mau, p.maQuocTich as quoctich, p.maDanToc as dantoc, p.maNgheNghiep as nghe_nghiep, p.diaChi as dia_chi, p.dienThoai as dien_thoai, ac.maTheBhyt as ma_the_bhyt, ac.maDkbd as ma_dkbd, ac.lyDoVv as ly_do_vv, ac.ngayVao as ngay_vao, ac.ngayRa as ngay_ra, ac.maNoiDen as maNoiDen, ac.maNoiDi as maNoiDi, amr.chanDoanRv as chan_doan_rv, amr.maBenhChinh as benh_chinh, amr.maBenhKt as benh_kt, amr.maBenhYhct as benh_yhct, amr.ketQuaDt as ket_qua_dtri, amr.maLoaiRv as loai_rv, amr.ghiChu as ghi_chu, amr.maLoaiKcb as loai_kcb, amr.ngayTaiKham as ngay_tai_kham, amr.duPhong as du_phong, p.maTinhCuTru as maTinh, p.maHuyenCuTru as maHuyen, p.maXaCuTru as maXa FROM iceberg.admision_checkin as ac inner join iceberg.admision_medical_record as amr on amr.admision_checkin_uuid = ac.id inner join iceberg.patient as p on ac.patient_id = p.uuid where amr.namQt = #{namQt} and p.soCccd = #{soCCCD} AND ac.maCskb = #{maCskcb} AND ac.maLk = #{maLk}

SELECT ac.maLk as ma_lk, aa.soGiayHenKl as so_giayhen_kl, aa.hoTen as ho_ten, aa.ngaySinh as ngay_sinh, aa.gioiTinh as gioi_tinh, aa.diaChi as dia_chi, aa.maTheBhyt as ma_the_bhyt, aa.gtTheDen as gt_the_den, aa.ngayVao as ngay_vao, aa.ngayVaoNoiTru as ngay_vao_noi_tru, aa.ngayRa as ngay_ra, aa.ngayHenKl as ngay_hen_kl, aa.chanDoanRv as chan_doan_rv, aa.maBenhChinh as benh_chinh, aa.maBenhKt as benh_kt, aa.maBenhYhct as benh_yhct, aa.maDoiTuongKcb as doituong_kcb, aa.maBacSi as bac_si, aa.maTtdv as ttdv, aa.ngayCt as ngay_ct, aa.maCskcb as ma_cskcb, aa.duPhong as du_phong FROM iceberg.admision_appointment as aa inner join iceberg.admision_checkin as ac on aa.admision_checkin_uuid = ac.id inner join iceberg.admision_medical_record as amr on amr.admision_checkin_uuid = ac.id inner join iceberg.patient as p on ac.patient_id = p.uuid where amr.namQt = #{namQt} and p.soCccd = #{soCCCD}

SELECT f.ten_cskb FROM iceberg.facility f WHERE f.ma_cskb = #{noiDi}

SELECT ac.id AS id, p.hoTen AS hoTen, p.ngaySinh AS ngaySinh, p.gioiTinh AS gioiTinh, p.maDanToc AS maDantoc, p.maQuocTich AS maQuoctich, p.maNgheNghiep AS maNgheNghiep, p.soCccd AS soCccd, ac.maTheBhyt AS maTheBhyt, ac.maDkbd AS maDkbd, p.dienThoai AS dienThoai, p.diaChi AS diaChi, p.maTinhCuTru AS matinhCuTru, p.maHuyenCuTru AS mahuyenCuTru, p.maXaCuTru AS maxaCuTru, amr.nguoiGiamHo AS nguoiGiamHo FROM iceberg.admision_medical_record amr JOIN iceberg.admision_checkin ac ON amr.admision_checkin_uuid = ac.id JOIN iceberg.patient p ON ac.patient_id = p.uuid WHERE ac.maCskb = #{maCSKCB} AND p.soCccd = #{soCCCD}

SELECT ac.ngayVao AS ngayVao, ac.ngayRa AS ngayRa, f.ma_cskb AS maCskcb, f.ten_cskb AS tenCskcb, amr.chanDoanRv AS chanDoanRv, amr.maBenhChinh AS maBenh FROM iceberg.admision_medical_record amr INNER JOIN iceberg.admision_checkin ac ON amr.admision_checkin_uuid = ac.id INNER JOIN iceberg.patient p ON ac.patient_id = p.uuid INNER JOIN iceberg.facility f ON ac.maCskb = f.ma_cskb WHERE f.ma_cskb = #{maCSKCB} AND p.soCccd = #{checkInId}

SELECT ac.id AS idCheckIn, f.ma_cskb AS maCskcb, f.ten_cskb AS tenCskb, ac.maNoiDi AS maNoiDi, ac.lyDoVv AS lyDoVv, amr.maLoaiKcb AS maLoaiKcb, ac.ngayVao AS ngayVao, ac.ngayRa AS ngayRa, amr.ketQuaDt AS ketQuaDtri, ac.maLoaiRv AS maLoaiRv, ac.maNoiDen AS maNoiDen, amr.chanDoanRv AS chanDoanRv, amr.maBenhChinh AS maBenh, amr.ghiChu AS ghiChu FROM iceberg.admision_medical_record amr INNER JOIN iceberg.admision_checkin ac ON amr.admision_checkin_uuid = ac.id INNER JOIN iceberg.facility f ON ac.maCskb = f.ma_cskb INNER JOIN iceberg.patient p ON ac.patient_id = p.uuid WHERE f.ma_cskb = #{maCSKCB} AND p.soCccd = #{checkInId}
